original: Blomberg, Carl Linus, vägdirektör, Kalmar, f. 17/1/93 i Gävle av verk-mäst. Oskar Linus B. o. Maria Kri- Stina Hillerström. G. 21 m. Elisabet Sandberg. Barn: Marie f. 22, Margareta 38. — Stud:ex. v. norra real i Stblm 14, avg:ex. fr. KTH (V) 19. Resa t. Danm. 34. Bitr. ing. i mell. väg- o. vattenbyggn :distr. 19-26, bitr. ing. h. vägkonsul. i Örebro o. Väst-mani. 1. 26-30, tf. byråing. v. väg- o. vattenbyggn :styr. 30-33, tf. väging. i Kalmar, 1. 33-36, ord. väging. där 36-43, vägdir. där sed. 43. Led. av stads-fullm., särsk. sekr. h. 31 års väg- o. brosaikik. 33. RNO, RVO.
translated: Blomberg, Carl Linus, Road Director, Kalmar, born January 17, 1893 in Gävle to foreman Oskar Linus B. and Maria Kristina Hillerström. Married on May 21 to Elisabet Sandberg. Children: Marie born in 1922, Margareta born in 1938. Graduated from Northeast Real School in Stockholm in 1914, and from the Royal Institute of Technology (Civil Engineering) in 1919. Traveled to Denmark in 1934. Assistant Engineer in the Middle Road and Water Building District from 1919-1926, Assistant Engineer for the Highway Consultant in Örebro and West Mani from 1926-1930, Acting Bureau Engineer for the Road and Water Building Authority from 1930-1933, Acting Road Director in Kalmar from 1933-1936, and Road Director there since 1943. A member of the City Council and Secretary of the 31-year Road and Bridge Association from 1933. Awarded RNO and RVO honors.

organization.name: Middle Road and Water Building District
Highway Consultant in Örebro and West Mani
